critique: This executive order focuses on environmental justice, aiming to address disproportionate environmental burdens on underserved communities. It emphasizes community engagement, data collection, and interagency coordination. It builds upon previous executive orders and aims for a whole-of-government approach. It does not directly address immigration, executive power, or federalism in a significant way. It leans liberal due to its focus on social equity and environmental protection. It promotes social inclusion by addressing disparities faced by marginalized communities. It also promotes government intervention to address environmental issues.
